item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2025-04-17
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2025-04-17.

Hongren Zheng gave an overview of the mgmt dialect which handles ciphertext management in the compiler. This talk starts at 27:11. The slides can be found here.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2024-03-07
item.description:
Here are the notes and video recording from the HEIR meeting on 2024-03-07.

Note: there will be no HEIR meeting on 2024-03-21 due to the FHE.org, HACS, and RWC conferences. Hope to see you all there!
